price: 1 Le jugement des hommes approche. Mais ces derniers, insouciants, se détournent de Nos avertissements.
arabic: ٱقۡتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: iq'taraba lilnnāsi ḥisābuhum wahum fī ghaflatin muʿ'riḍūna
